constituent: co-, ten, needle, triceps, power, muscle, arnold, power3, muscle3, arnold3
heisigStory: This prefix should be kept distinct from inter (Frame 222) and mutual (Frame 819). Its elements: needle . . . triceps.
koohiiStory1: The nurse says : “If you co-operate, that needle (syringe) in your triceps won´t hurt”. Note: both co- and cooperate are meanings for this kanji.
koohiiStory2: Co-operation: 3 persons can have the power of ten if they co-operate.
myStory: hoà hợp, cùng nhau. chữ Hiệp. mười ba lưc.
